SEARCH
Module clientCLI
Package com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models

Class TicketingModel

java.lang.Object
com.etiennecollin.ift2255.clientCLI.models.TicketingModel
public class TicketingModel extends Object
The TicketingModel class represents the models for handling ticket-related operations in the CLI application. It interacts with the underlying database to perform operations such as retrieving tickets, creating return shipments, and creating replacement shipments.

    • TicketingModel

      public TicketingModel(Database db)

  • Method Details

    • getTickets

      public List<Ticket> getTickets(Predicate<Ticket> predicate)
      Retrieves a list of tickets that satisfy the given predicate.
      Parameters:
      predicate - The predicate used to filter tickets.
      Returns:
      A list of tickets that satisfy the given predicate.

    • updateTickets

      public void updateTickets()
      Updates the state of tickets based on specific criteria, such as canceling tickets that are overdue for return shipments. This method is responsible for maintaining the consistency of ticket states in the system.

    • createManualTicket

      public OperationResult createManualTicket(UUID orderId, ArrayList<Tuple<Product,Integer>> products, String description, TicketCause cause)
      Creates a manual ticket for the specified order, products, description, and cause.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The unique identifier of the order.
      products - The list of products and quantities associated with the ticket.
      description - The description of the ticket.
      cause - The cause or reason for creating the manual ticket.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • createAutoTicket

      public OperationResult createAutoTicket(UUID orderId, ArrayList<Tuple<Product,Integer>> products, TicketCause cause, UUID replacementOrderId)
      Creates an automatic ticket for the specified order, products, cause, and replacement order ID.
      Parameters:
      orderId - The unique identifier of the order.
      products - The list of products and quantities associated with the ticket.
      cause - The cause or reason for creating the automatic ticket.
      replacementOrderId - The unique identifier of the replacement order, if applicable.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • activateExchangeTicket

      public OperationResult activateExchangeTicket(Ticket ticket, Order originalOrder, List<CartProduct> cartProductList)
      Activates an exchange ticket, updating the ticket state and creating a replacement order if applicable.
      Parameters:
      ticket - The exchange ticket to be activated.
      originalOrder - The original order associated with the exchange ticket.
      cartProductList - The list of products in the exchange cart.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • createReplacementShipment

      public OperationResult createReplacementShipment(UUID ticketId, String description, String trackingNumber, LocalDate deliveryDate, String shippingCompany)
      Creates a replacement shipment for the specified ticket with the given information.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The unique identifier of the ticket.
      description - The description of the replacement product.
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the replacement shipment.
      deliveryDate - The expected delivery date of the replacement shipment.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company responsible for the replacement shipment.
      Returns:
      An OperationResult indicating the success or failure of the operation.

    • getTicket

      public Ticket getTicket(UUID ticketId)
      Retrieves the ticket with the specified ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The unique identifier of the ticket.
      Returns:
      The ticket with the specified ID, or null if the ticket does not exist.

    • changeTicketToReplacement

      public OperationResult changeTicketToReplacement(UUID ticketId, String solution, boolean requireReturn, String trackingNumber, String shippingCompany)
      Changes a ticket to indicate replacement with or without return.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket to modify.
      solution - The proposed solution for the ticket.
      requireReturn - Whether the replacement requires a return shipment.
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the return shipment.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company responsible for the return shipment.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • refundOrChargeBuyer

      private void refundOrChargeBuyer(UUID ticketId)
      Refunds or charges the buyer based on the ticket information.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket for which the refund or charge operation is performed.

    • changeTicketToNoReplacement

      public OperationResult changeTicketToNoReplacement(UUID ticketId, String solution, boolean requireReturn, String trackingNumber, String shippingCompany)
      Changes a ticket to indicate no replacement, with or without return.
      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket to modify.
      solution - The proposed solution for the ticket.
      requireReturn - Whether the replacement requires a return shipment.
      trackingNumber - The tracking number of the return shipment.
      shippingCompany - The shipping company responsible for the return shipment.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).

    • confirmReceptionOfReplacement

      Parameters:
      ticketId - The UUID of the ticket for which the replacement reception is confirmed.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation (success or failure).
